text:
Dear Sir/Madam,
My name is Alex Dupont and I am 19 years old. I was born in Paris and I study at the University of Rennes in information and communication. I want to go to Paris this year because I like to travel and I think that this country is very developed in communication especially add, I think Times Square in Paris. the travel is a way of discovering myself and other cultures to learn another way of life and American life is very different from French life.
 I’d like to stage in Paris, it’s a very open-minded city. I went there last summer and I think I need more time to visit this amazing city; it’s a good way to speak a better English. this licence information and communication is a formation who touch at various teaching : sociology, history and it's an area who demands general culture.
I really interesting by museums of art or sciences, music like classic jazz or electro, I like to analyze social rapport.
 I'm really dynamique person and thirst for knowledge. a stage will permit myself to enter in world of adulthood and practice while discovering. I am also passionate about graphics, it's an idea of job for the moment but I'm not close at others options.
